mapper.select: SELECT max(end_time) endTime FROM match_ticket a INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM match_zone WHERE match_id = #{macth_id} ) b ON a.zone_id = b.id WHERE is_defalut = 0

SELECT a.zone_name zone_id, b.venue_ids, b.free, b.description, b.ticket_name, b.begin_time, b.end_time, b.is_defalut, b.use_defalut FROM match_zone a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.* FROM match_ticket a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id FROM match_venue a INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.id ticketId, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.venue_ids, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) venueId FROM ( SELECT * FROM match_ticket WHERE is_defalut = 0 AND use_defalut = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id <( LENGTH(a.venue_ids) - LENGTH( REPLACE (a.venue_ids, ',', '') ) + 1 ) ) b ON a.id = b.venueId WHERE a.kind = #{progress_id} ) b ON a.id = b.id WHERE a.is_defalut = 0 AND a.use_defalut = 0 ) b ON a.id = b.zone_id

SELECT b.ticket_name ticketName, b.description, a.title, a.sub_title, b.audienceId, a.match_image_url url, b.isAttend, b.venue_ids venueIds, b.free FROM match_event a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.*, b.match_id matchId,b.id audienceId,b.is_attend isAttend FROM match_ticket a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM match_audience WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND match_id = #{match_id} ) b ON a.id = b.match_ticket_id ) b ON a.id = b.matchId
